Desc.entry: Cycling club for adults and children aged 12 years and over, which promotes all aspects of cycling, eg road racing, time trials, cyclo-cross, etc. Also holds social events. Organises competitive and leisure cycling. Holds a hill climb in October, and an annual dinner and prize giving event in November. Holds midweek 10 mile time trial every Wednesday at 7pm from May-August and training rides from April-September.

ProvisionPlace.entry: Junction of Bents Road and Ecclesall Road South

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Sat & Sun at 9am (club rides, venue posted on website)
